name: Cisco & Martina
description:
Cisco & Martina

This was a commission of a short game to be played at a wedding.

Start by incarnating the bridegroom 15 years in the past. Get past the bully to go sit next to your future wife. Back in the present play the bridegroom and the bride in a fun little coop minigame.

Controls:

Bridegroom: 

Move right &left - A & D

Jump - W

Bride: 

Move right &left - J & L

Jump - I
